mapper.select:
SELECT MCI_ID, MAX(MCI_DIV) AS MCI_DIV, MAX(MCI_CONDITION) AS MCI_CONDITION, MAX(MCI_METHOD) AS MCI_METHOD FROM MACHINE_CHECK_INFO where 1=1
AND mci_div Like '%' || #{find_machine_check_type} || '%'
AND mci_method Like '%' || #{find_machine_check_method} || '%'
AND mci_condition Like '%' || #{find_machine_check_condition} || '%'
GROUP BY MCI_ID ORDER BY MCI_ID
SELECT MCI_DIV FROM MACHINE_CHECK_INFO GROUP BY MCI_DIV
SELECT MCI_METHOD FROM MACHINE_CHECK_INFO GROUP BY MCI_METHOD
SELECT MCI_ID, MCI_DIV, MCI_METHOD, MCI_CONDITION FROM (Select MCI_ID, MCI_DIV, MCI_METHOD, MCI_CONDITION from MACHINE_CHECK_INFO ORDER BY MCI_MI_ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY) MI
SELECT mi_id, mi_name FROM MACHINE_INFO order by mi_id

SELECT ROWNUM, MI.MCI_ID, MI.MCI_DIV, MI.MCI_METHOD, MI.MCI_CONDITION FROM (SELECT MCI_ID, MCI_DIV, MCI_METHOD, MCI_CONDITION FROM MACHINE_CHECK_INFO
WHERE MCI_MI_ID = #{find_machine_id}
WHERE 1=2
ORDER BY MCI_ID) MI
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Machine_Check_Record (MCR_ID, MCR_MCI_ID, MCR_MI_ID, MCR_EMP_ID, MCR_DATE, MCR_ANSWER, MCR_NOTE) VALUES ( MACHINE_CHECK_RECORD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mcr_mci_id}, ${mcr_mi_id}, ${mcr_emp_id}, sysdate, #{mcr_answer}, #{mcr_note} )
